summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of ProFireManager Planning module. Fixed JavaScript compilation error (duplicate function) but identified critical issues with guard type application days, missing month view, and guard details functionality.

ui_bugs.issue: Guard types not respecting application days - weekday guards show on weekends and vice versa
ui_bugs.details: Garde Interne AM/PM - Semaine showing on Saturday/Sunday, Garde interne AM/PM - Week-end showing on Monday-Friday
Only 'Vue semaine' button present, no month view functionality available

ui_bugs.issue: Clicking on assigned guard cells does not open details modal
ui_bugs.details: Guard details modal not opening when clicking on assigned guards to see personnel details

ui_bugs.issue: Modal overlay interaction issues causing click timeouts
ui_bugs.details: Modal overlays intercepting pointer events causing interaction difficulties

passed_tests: Frontend compilation without JavaScript errors (duplicate function fixed)
Planning grid display with guard types
User selection list display in assignment modal (4 users found)
action_item_for_E1: Critical issues identified in Planning module: 1) Implement month view functionality, 2) Fix guard type application days logic in shouldShowTypeGardeForDay function, 3) Fix guard details modal opening functionality, 4) Resolve modal overlay interaction issues
